I can only answer this question for the
role that art has had in my life and why
I wanted to do this book I think when
you see something that you relate to a
story that you relate to it makes you
feel less lonely in this world uh I
think art has the ability to mobilize
and Inspire and make people Aspire so I
mean that's that's the great place of

think there was for me a real Gap in the

that could sort of make people
understand and relate to these these
stories in ways in which they would
perhaps do something and to stop it um
is it funded enough no no it's it's

should be funded uh for so many reasons
because without art it's a flat Society
we need that we need that inspiration
and um without art our world is a dead

and there's something really raw and
pure about having somebody who's not
trained just write and just photograph
um there's it's almost like a smudge
that's so fresh you can touch it that's
that's that's why that's why I believe
in this so much
